question: The Adi Purana compiled in 9th century is the hagiography of which of the following?
explanation: The Adi Purana which was compiled in 9th century is the hagiography of Jaina founder Rishabha also known as Adinatha. Rishabha Adinath (symbol-Bull) was the first Trithankara and Mahavira (symbol-Lion) was the last Tirthankara.
